definitions.explanation_en: A feminine given name of Hebrew origin, commonly used in English-speaking countries, often a diminutive form of Elizabeth.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个源自希伯来语的女性名字，常见于英语国家，通常是“Elizabeth”（伊丽莎白）的昵称或缩写形式。
definitions.example_en: Liza is the lead singer in the band and writes most of their lyrics.
definitions.example_cn: 丽莎是这支乐队的主唱，创作了大部分歌词。
